state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to attempt to move south. With that done, attempt to go east. And then, take a trip north. Once you do that, make an effort to travel west. With that accomplished, take a trip west. Okay, and then, go to the north. And then, make an effort to move north. Then, try to travel east. After that, venture south. If you can get around to doing that, travel south. And then, go west. And then, attempt to travel west. And then, venture north. With that done, go north. Next, retrieve the coin from the floor of the bedroom. That's it! -= Pantry =- You've entered a pantry. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. > -= Pantry =-0/1
next_state: -= Cookhouse =- Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a cookhouse. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Cookhouse =-0/2
